articles.author: Caroline Valetkevitch
articles.description: U.S. stocks mostly edged lower on Tuesday as worries lingered that the Federal Reserve will need to keep interest rates higher for longer and as banks shares eased.
articles.title: Dow, S&P 500 ease as rate worries mount, banks shares dip

articles.author: Luc Cohen
articles.description: Sam Bankman-Fried, founder of the now-bankrupt cryptocurrency exchange FTX, is due back in court on Tuesday for the first time since a U.S. judge revoked his bail and sent him to jail, and is expected to plead not guilty to a new indictment alleging fraud and conspiracy charges.
articles.title: Jailed FTX founder Bankman-Fried to return to court for new plea

articles.author: Saqib Ahmed
articles.description: Traders in the U.S. equity options market are expecting a larger-than-usual swing in Nvidia's (NVDA.O) shares following the chipmaker's quarterly results after the close on Wednesday, options market data showed.
articles.title: Nvidia options show traders positioned for outsized share move after earnings

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: China's leader Xi Jinping told the BRICS group on Tuesday that China's economy was resilient and that the fundamentals for its long-term growth remained unchanged.
articles.title: China's Xi tells BRICS summit that Chinese economy is resilient

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The U.S. government said on Tuesday it had awarded $1.4 billion for the development of new therapies and vaccines against COVID-19, including a $326 million contract with Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN.O) for a next-generation antibody therapy for prevention of infections.
articles.title: US govt awards $1.4 bln for development of new COVID therapies, vaccines

articles.author: Rajesh Singh, Allison Lampert
articles.description: Bo Ellis has been a devoted member of the Air Line Pilots Association (ALPA) for nearly four decades, but the 64-year-old is waging a campaign against the union to extend his flying career.
articles.title: Focus: US airline pilots fight their unions to increase retirement age

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Elon Musk is pushing to change how news links appear on his social media platform X, formerly called Twitter, in a move that could potentially undermine the ability of news publishers to draw audience.
articles.title: Elon Musk's X plans to remove headlines from links to news articles

articles.author: Mushtaq Ali, Asif Shahzad, Gibran Peshimam
articles.description: Rescuers in Pakistan pulled all seven children and one man to safety after their cable car became stranded high over a remote ravine on Tuesday, officials said, ending an ordeal lasting more than 15 hours.
articles.title: Day-long Pakistan cable car ordeal ends with all passengers rescued

articles.author: Nivedita Bhattacharjee, Joey Roulette
articles.description: The space race India aims to win this week by landing first on the moon's south pole is about science, the politics of national prestige and a new frontier: money.
articles.title: India's boom, Russia's crunch: how money is shaping a new space race

articles.author: Jack Queen
articles.description: The first of Donald Trump's co-defendants in Georgia's criminal case accusing the former U.S. president and his associates of subverting his 2020 election loss surrendered at an Atlanta jail on Tuesday, according to county records and a statement.
articles.title: First Trump allies in Georgia election subversion case surrender
